document.full_text: american dave zabriskie pedaled to a 14-second time trial win while compatriot levi leipheimer closed the gap on overall race leader chris horner in the sixth stage of the tour of california on friday.
document.title: zabriskie wins sixth stage, horner retains overall lead
lines_and_colors: american dave zabriskie pedaled to a 14-second time trial win while compatriot levi leipheimer closed the gap on overall race leader chris horner in the sixth stage of the tour of california on friday.
